SummaryEnglish: Event planner Yuka Sawatani‘s life ended as the result of overwork. Reborn into an Otome game with her memory intact, she becomes the villainess Elizabeth. She tries to resist her fate, but at the ending of the game, she is promptly banished.
Aliases: After the Villainess' Exile! Living Quietly as a Nun Reforming with Church Meals
Akuyaku Reijou no Tsuihougo! Kyoukai Kaikaku Gohan de Yuuyuu Shisutaa-gurashi
Akuyaku Reijou no Tsuihougo! Kyoukai Kaikaku gohan de Yuuyuu Sister Kurashi
Akuyaku Reijō no Tsuihōgo! Kyōkai Kaikaku Gohan de Yūyū Shisutā-gurashi
Akuyaku Reijō no Tsuihōgo! Kyōkai Kaikaku Gohan de Yūyū Sister Kurashi
I Was Exiled as a Villainess!
I Was Exiled as a Villainess! I Am Now a Sister Living the Good life Through a Culinary Reform
The Banished Villainess! Living the Leisurely Life of a Nun Making Revolutionary Church Food
悪役令嬢の追放後！ 教会改革ごはんで悠々シスター暮らし
